title: Is it possible that we are simulated in someone's computer? - Quora

response.answer_text: well if u look on youtube there is quite a lot of content regarding this , any ways the answer for me is yes it is possible . in a few years our computer technology will be so powerful that a human would not be able to distinguish between a simulation and a real life scenario . so , its quite obvious now that what if we too were put into a computer just for some study purpose.
